div.head: 卒中惡死
div.div: sudden [appearance of] death resulting from being struck by the malign

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: sudden [appearance of] death resulting from being struck by the malign

sense.def: Alternative Names cu e si 卒惡死 , sudden [appearance of] death resulting from [being struck by] the malign. Pathological Condition of sudden appearance of death resulting from being unexpectedly struck by the malign. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu 鶩 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 1: 救卒死，或先病痛，或常居寢 臥，奄忽而絕，皆是中死 , “For sudden [appearance of death] either following prior disease and pain, or after a normal life while asleep, with a sudden cut-off, these all are cases of a fatal strike”, writes: 卒中惡死 , “ Sudden [appearance of] death resulting from being struck by the malign ”.
